title: Opinion
text:
If taught by from AM from VGSOM, don't take the course. Reasons not to take the course:
• Content: No content in the course at all. You will be expected to memorize definitions of several commonly used daily words. No actual learning.
• Prof attitude: Not good. Expects forceful involvement in class.
An interesting topic like Human behavior is reduced to the boring definitions by Prof AM. If there is a change of professor. Please update this wiki page.
page: BM40004: INTRODUCTION TO HUMAN BEHAVIOUR IN ORGANISATION
